comment.author: 76204898@N00
comment._content: Ada Comstock (December 11, 1876-December 12, 1973) was an American women's education pioneer. She served as the first dean of women at the University of Minnesota and later as the first full-time president of Radcliffe College. I added the picture to the Wikipedia article, the big version is now at commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:Ada_Comstock_(LOC_ggbain....

comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Her papers are at Harvard: oasis.lib.harvard.edu/oasis/deliver/~sch00104 And at Smith College (where she was also on the faculty): asteria.fivecolleges.edu/findaids/smitharchives/manosca15...

comment.author: 34904489@N07
comment._content:
trialsanderrors and pennylrichardsca:

Thanks for the research on the many accomplishments of Ms. Comstock. We will add to the description for this photograph when we update.
